item.title: On a strategic hiatus
item.description: I’m going on a 6-month break from YouTube and will return on March 1, 2025. During this break, I will focus on writing, staying true to the original essence of blogging. Currently, I don’t have the content that I believe will benefit my growth on YouTube. While I could produce a lot of click-bait content, that’s not my intent with content creation. I’m working on a couple of complex projects and need to invest heavily in them.
